item.title: Logarithmic Smoothing for Pessimistic Off-Policy Evaluation, Selection and Learning
item.description: Logarithmic Smoothing enhances pessimistic offline contextual bandit algorithms by providing tighter concentration bounds for improved policy evaluation, selection and learning.
